metadata.title: CVE-2022-4183 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Popup Blocker in Google Chrome prior to108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
